com.snap2d.gl.opengl

Class GLUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snap2d.gl.opengl.GLUtils

  • public class GLUtils
extends Object
    Provides common utility methods for interfacing with OpenGL libraries. Some members of this class simply act as forward-wrappers for JOGL/Gluegen utilities.
    Author:
    Brian Groenke

        public static final FloatBuffer writeColorToBuffer(Color color,

        Writes the RGBA components of the given Color to a FloatBuffer as OpenGL color values (0.0f - 1.0f).
        Parameters:
        color - the java.awt.Color to convert
        colorBuff - a FloatBuffer with capacity/limit >= 4
        Returns:

      • convertColorAwtToGL

        public static final float[] convertColorAwtToGL(Color color)
        Converts an AWT Color (0f - 255f) linearly to GL color space (0.0f - 1.0f).
        Parameters:
        color - the AWT color to convert
        Returns:
        an array of GL color channels
